Name: Magnetic moment
Description: The magnetic moment, including its uncertainty, of a subatomic particle in units of Bohr magneton.

Properties.Name: Magnetic moment
Properties.Description: The magnetic moment in units of Bohr magnetons.

Properties.Name: Uncertainty
Properties.Description: The uncertainty in the magnetic moment, in units of Bohr magnetons. The full value eg 0.00005, opposed to (5).
